I had look back though the archives and I found some junit/ant posts to/from
Yishay, but I didn't find any special steps that need to be taken.  I've got
my class path set with all the junit and ant jars but it don't work out of
the box.
 
Are there any specific customisation steps that anyone can advise?
 
Thanks
 
Dave

-----Original Message-----
From: Sanjay Bhatia [mailto:sbix@...]
Sent: 04 July 2001 16:40
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [junit] execution log file


WOW!  That was really informative.  How about putting in a line or 2 about
what
help you received from your friends on the list?  Or are you too accustomed
to
just receiving help?

sb
